snippet: Nelson Mandela, the former president of South Africa who is now 94, had a successful endoscopic procedure, the government said.
abstract: South Africa's ailing former Pres Nelson Mandela has surgery to have gallstones removed as he begins second week of hospitalization.
lead_paragraph: Nelson Mandela, the former president of South Africa who is now 94, had a successful endoscopic procedure, the government said.

headline.seo: Mandela Has Surgery to Remove Gallstones
